Reviews.Title: it's okay for kids
Reviews.Author: Barbra A. Erbskorn "Barbra a Erbskorn"
Reviews.Content: It is not to be what it appears. You get blurred video and messy pictures the pictures like to come out with red tint's and when you try to fix the picture you get pixels all over the picture.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Camera
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: Images are blurry and fuzzy no matter which setting is chosen and it doesnt remember the settings once you turn it off. I thought my son just took poor pictures but it is the camera and not him! So not worth any money.

ProductInfo.Features:
12-CUP (60-OUNCE) CAPACITY
NEVER MOVE YOUR COFFEE MAKER AGAIN! Patented system allows you to access the water tank and coffee filter from the front without moving the machine
TO EXTRACT THE IDEAL FLAVOR AND AROMA for a full-bodied cup of coffee, use the Aroma button, it time-releases water to saturate coffee grounds a little at a time
WAKE UP TO FRESH-BREWED COFFEE with the 24-hour programmable digital timer
CONVENIENT water level indicator
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar 7.1MP 1.8 Flip-black
